mapper.sql: zb.pkid pkid, zb.id id, zb.zbqcbm zbqcbm, zb.zbqcmc zbqcmc, zb.zbqclxdm zbqclxdm, zb.zbqclxmc zbqclxmc, zb.cllxdm cllxdm, zb.cllxmc cllxmc, zb.sfxhxzb sfxhxzb, zb.ggxh ggxh, zb.jldwdm jldwdm, zb.ckj ckj, zb.zl zl, zb.tj tj, zb.cz cz, zb.bzh bzh, zb.jcph jcph, zb.kssj kssj, zb.zycf zycf, zb.syfw syfw, zb.zrjylbdm zrjylbdm, zb.jkzbgndls jkzbgndls, zb.shfwdw shfwdw, zb.byzq byzq, zb.jczq jczq, zb.jlzt jlzt, zb.cszt cszt, TO_CHAR(zb.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, zb.bz bz, TO_CHAR(zb.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, zb.sjbb sjbb, zb.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, TO_CHAR(zb.vercol,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') vercol, zb.tbjdh tbjdh, TO_CHAR(zb.tbsjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tbsjc, zb.reserve1 reserve1, zb.reserve2 reserve2, TO_CHAR(zb.reserve3,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve3
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM WL_ZBQCDY zb WHERE 1=1 AND JLZT = 'N'

SELECT
FROM WL_ZBQCDY zb WHERE zb.JLZT = '1'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WL_ZBQCDY(pkid,id,zbqcbm,zbqcmc,zbqclxdm,zbqclxmc,cllxdm,cllxmc,sfxhxzb,ggxh,jldwdm,ckj,zl,tj,cz,bzh,jcph,kssj,zycf,syfw,zrjylbdm,jkzbgndls,shfwdw,byzq,jczq,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,cjsj,sjbb,ywxtbsid,vercol,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES(#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbqcbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbqcmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbqclxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbqclxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cllxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cllxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfxhxzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ggxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jldwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ckj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{tj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jcph,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{kssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zycf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{syfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zrjylbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jkzbgndls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shfwdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{byzq,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jczq,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{vercol,jdbcType=DATE},#{tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE WL_ZBQCDY zb SET zb.JLZT = '0' WHERE 1=1 AND zb.id = #{id}

INSERT INTO WL_ZBQCDY(pkid,id,zbqcbm,zbqcmc,zbqclxdm,zbqclxmc,cllxdm,cllxmc,sfxhxzb,ggxh,jldwdm,ckj,zl,tj,cz,bzh,jcph,kssj,zycf,syfw,zrjylbdm,jkzbgndls,shfwdw,byzq,jczq,jlzt,cszt,sjc,bz,cjsj,sjbb,ywxtbsid,vercol,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.zbqcbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbqcbm,#{item.zbqcmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbqcmc,#{item.zbqclxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbqclxdm,#{item.zbqclxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbqclxmc,#{item.cllxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cllxdm,#{item.cllxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cllxmc,#{item.sfxhxzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sfxhxzb,#{item.ggxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ggxh,#{item.jldwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jldwdm,#{item.ckj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ckj,#{item.zl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zl,#{item.tj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} tj,#{item.cz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cz,#{item.bzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bzh,#{item.jcph,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jcph,#{item.kssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} kssj,#{item.zycf,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zycf,#{item.syfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} syfw,#{item.zrjylbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zrjylbdm,#{item.jkzbgndls,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jkzbgndls,#{item.shfwdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shfwdw,#{item.byzq,jdbcType=DOUBLE} byzq,#{item.jczq,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jczq,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.vercol,jdbcType=DATE} vercol,#{item.tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tbjdh,#{item.tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE} tbsjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=DATE} reserve3
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pkid = VALUES(pkid), id = VALUES(id), zbqcbm = VALUES(zbqcbm), zbqcmc = VALUES(zbqcmc), zbqclxdm = VALUES(zbqclxdm), zbqclxmc = VALUES(zbqclxmc), cllxdm = VALUES(cllxdm), cllxmc = VALUES(cllxmc), sfxhxzb = VALUES(sfxhxzb), ggxh = VALUES(ggxh), jldwdm = VALUES(jldwdm), ckj = VALUES(ckj), zl = VALUES(zl), tj = VALUES(tj), cz = VALUES(cz), bzh = VALUES(bzh), jcph = VALUES(jcph), kssj = VALUES(kssj), zycf = VALUES(zycf), syfw = VALUES(syfw), zrjylbdm = VALUES(zrjylbdm), jkzbgndls = VALUES(jkzbgndls), shfwdw = VALUES(shfwdw), byzq = VALUES(byzq), jczq = VALUES(jczq), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjc = VALUES(sjc), bz = VALUES(bz), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), vercol = VALUES(vercol), tbjdh = VALUES(tbjdh), tbsjc = VALUES(tbsjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM WL_ZBQCDY zb WHERE zb.JLZT = '1'

SELECT
FROM WL_ZBQCDY zb WHERE zb.JLZT = '1'
and zb.zbqcmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{zbqcmc}),'%')
